properties.name: resume
properties.description: Waits for a certain amount of time

options.name: After Time Interval
options.description: Waits for a certain amount of time

options.name: At Specified Time
options.description: Waits until a specific date and time to continue

options.name: On Webhook Call
options.description: Waits for a webhook call before continuing

options.name: On Form Submitted
options.description: Waits for a form submission before continuing

properties.name: incomingAuthentication
properties.description: If and how incoming resume-webhook-requests to $execution.resumeFormUrl should be authenticated for additional security

properties.name: dateTime
properties.description: The date and time to wait for before continuing

properties.name: webhookNotice
properties.displayName: The webhook URL will be generated at run time. It can be referenced with the $execution.resumeUrl variable. Send it somewhere before getting to this node. More info

properties.name: formNotice
properties.displayName: The form url will be generated at run time. It can be referenced with the $execution.resumeFormUrl variable. Send it somewhere before getting to this node. More info
